## 

```{r}
for (i in 1:nrow(arguments)) {
  switch (arguments[i, 'row_type'],
    func = write(paste0(arguments[i, 'function_name'], '('), 
                          file = paste0(Sys.getenv('REPORT_FILES_PATH'), '/job-script.R'), 
                          append = TRUE ),
    argument = write(paste0('  ', arguments[i, 'argument'], '=', arguments[i, 'argument']), 
                          file = paste0(Sys.getenv('REPORT_FILES_PATH'), '/job-script.R'), 
                          append = TRUE ),
    operator = write(paste0('  )', arguments[i, 'operator']), 
                          file = paste0(Sys.getenv('REPORT_FILES_PATH'), '/job-script.R'), 
                          append = TRUE )
  )
}
```
